channel.title: SImple Help
channel.description:
Can somone simply help me with this lame question :|
I need this script to do a task for me, it involvles a 800x600 full screen game. how can i set the screen for that? also i need to click a color . i have ClickMSColorTol(9425097,True); but it says Line 12: [Error] (15510:30): Invalid number of parameters in script at the endof the ; any ideas how to fix i have {.Include SRL/SRL.scar} already.
~M0rtion

item.title: SImple Help
item.dc:creator: @R.I.P_RSC R.I.P RSC
item.description:
@R.I.P_RSC wrote:

You havent set the tolerance. I think it should be something like ClickMSColorTol(9425097,2,2,True);
The part ‘2,2’ is the tolerance. If that doesnt work use this:

findcolorspiral(x,y,9425097,r,r,l,l); clickmouse(x,y, true);

With ‘r,r,l,l’ being the x and y values where the color has to be between.

Read full topic
